jcr:content.jcr:title: List of cities and towns in Ethiopia

contentheadline.headline: List of cities and towns in Ethiopia

contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Ethiopia.png|250px|right|thumb| Map of Ethiopia]] This is a '''list of [[city|cities]] and [[town]]s in [[Ethiopia]]''': {{TOC}} {{Largest cities of Ethiopia}} == A == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> [[File:Addis-sheraton.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Addis Ababa]], Capital of [[Ethiopia]]]] * [[Adama]] (also called ''Nazareth'' or ''Nazret'') * [[Addis Ababa]] * [[Addis Alem, Shewa|Addis Alem]] (also called Ejersa) * [[Addis Zemen]] * [[Adigrat]] * [[Adwa]] * [[Agaro]] * [[Akaki]] * [[Alaba, Ethiopia|Alaba]] (also called "Quliito" or Kulito) * [[Alitena]] * [[Amba Mariam]] * [[Ambo, Ethiopia|Ambo]] * [[Ankober]] * [[Arba Minch]] * [[Arboye]] * [[Asaita]] * [[Asella]] * [[Asosa]] * [[Awasa]] * [[Awash]] * [[Axum]] * [[Alamata]] </div> == B== <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Babille]] * [[Baco, Ethiopia|Baco]] * [[Badme]] * [[Bahir Dar]] * [[Bati, Ethiopia|Bati]] * [[Bedele]] * [[Beica]] * [[Bichena]] * [[Bonga]] * [[Bishoftu]] </div> == C == * [[Ciro]] * [[Chencha]] == D == <div style="-moz-column-count:3"> [[File:Dessie TosssaView.JPG|thumb|right|250px|[[Dessie]]]] * [[Dabat]] * [[Dangila]] * [[Debarq]] * [[Debre Berhan]] * [[Debre Marqos]] * [[Debre Tabor]] * [[Debre Werq]] * [[Debre Zebit]] * [[Dejen]] * [[Dembidolo]] * [[Dessie]] (or ''Dese'') * [[Dila, Ethiopia|Dila]] * [[Dire Dawa]] * [[Dolo Bay]] * [[Dolo Odo]] * [[Durame]] </div> == F == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Finicha'a]] * [[Fiche]] * [[Finote Selam]] </div> == G == <div style="-moz-column-count:3"> [[File:Gonder from the Goha hotel.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Gondar]]]] * [[Gambela, Ethiopia|Gambela]] * [[Gelemso]] * [[Ghimbi]] * [[Ginir]] * [[Goba]] * [[Gode]] * [[Gondar]] * [[Gongoma]] * [[Gore, Ethiopia|Gore]] * [[Gorgora]] * [[Guion, Ethiopia|Guion]] </div> == H == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> [[File:Town of Harar with Citywall.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Harar]]]] * [[Harar]] (or ''Harer'') * [[Hayq, Ethiopia|Hayq]] * [[Holeta]] * [[Hossana]] * [[Humera]] </div> == I == <div style="-moz-column-count:3"> * [[Imi]] * [[Irgalem]] </div> == J == <div style="-moz-column-count:3"> * [[Jijiga]] * [[Jimma]] * [[Jinka]] </div> == K == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Kabri Dar]] * [[Kebri Mangest]] * [[Kobo, Ethiopia|Kobo]] * [[Kombolcha]] * [[Konso]] * [[Kulubi]] </div> == L == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Lalibela]] * [[Genet, Ethiopia|Limmu Genet]] </div> == M == <div style="-moz-column-count:3"> * [[Maji]] * [[Maychew]] * [[Mek'ele]] * [[Mendi, Ethiopia|Mendi]] * [[Metemma]] * [[Metu, Ethiopia|Metu]] * [[Mizan Teferi]] * [[Mojo, Ethiopia|Mojo]] * [[Mota, Ethiopia|Mota]] * [[Moyale]] </div> == N == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Negash]] * [[Negele Boran]] * [[Nekemte]] </div> == S == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Shashamane]] * [[Shire, Ethiopia|Shire]] (or ''Inda Selassie'') * [[Shilavo]] * [[Sodo]], also known as Wolaita Sodo * [[Sodore]] </div> == T == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Tenta]] * [[Tiya]] * [[Tippi, Ethiopia|Tippi]] * [[Tullu Milki]] * [[Turmi]] </div> == W == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Wacca]] * [[Walwal]] * [[Werder, Ethiopia|Werder]] * [[Wereta]] * [[Woldia]] * Wolaita Sodo, see [[Sodo]] * [[Wolleka]] * [[Wuchale]] </div> == Y == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Yabelo]] * [[Yeha]] </div> == Z == <div style="-moz-column-count:2"> * [[Ziway]] </div> ==See also== *[[List of cities]] ==External links== *[http://www.world-gazetteer.com/s/p_et.htm World Gazetteer Map of Ethiopia (German)]
